Posts.Content: I was in the same position as you with hair falling out. Had it shaved off at hairdressers. Took sometime to feel confident to go without cover. With this hot weather it was good to have a No 3. Also hot flushes.
Posts.Title: I've done it! Shaved my head today...

Posts.Content: I know what you mean. Had my mastectomy end of November, and had my 3rd chemo on Monday.  Found that planning bite size jobs, whether it's house work or shopping, made it easier. Also going for walks even if it's only for 30 minutes helps me.  Just take it easy.
Posts.Title: just chatting

Posts.Content: My next cycle, X 4, of Chemo is going to be with Docetaxel and Herceptin. Can anyone inform me how they coped with these two?  Or any side effects etc. It would be of great help.  Thanks in advance.
Posts.Title: Docetaxel & Heceptin Chemo
